page.title: 07Stanton Great Wood
page.content: Stanton Great Wood is 150 acres of ainly dicidnous trees (about 1000 to an acre).There are Munt deer and backing deer and fallow deer.Every year some deer are shot to keep the numbers down.They have made a new plantation in the wood and it has a special fence around it for rabbits and it goes under gound to stop them burrowing and it has a high fence for the deer.The plantation is planted in lines of soft wood and hard wood trees because in the time one hard wood tree can be grown two soft wood trees can be grown. Sometimes there are too many trees so the woodman has to thin them out by cutting down the bad ones and letting the stronger ones grow. One woodman looks after 300 acres. There are 4 wooden high seats in the wood where the man looks over the forest. In 1976 a fire burned fields near the wood
